title: adidas: I'm Here To Create feat. Leo Messi
description:
Messi is not here for the records. He's here to create. 

Leo Messi has cemented his place as a phenomenon in football with a record fifth Ballon d’Or, the greatest acknowledgement of individual success in football. But it’s not the records broken, the trophies won, or the accolades which matter most. Messi is here to create. 

Soundtrack:

Artist: Lazy Boyz
Title: Right Now

asset.title: adidas: I'm Here To Create feat. Leo Messi
asset.description:
Messi is not here for the records. He's here to create. 

Leo Messi has cemented his place as a phenomenon in football with a record fifth Ballon d’Or, the greatest acknowledgement of individual success in football. But it’s not the records broken, the trophies won, or the accolades which matter most. Messi is here to create.

Title: Right Now
asset.author: adidas

transcripts:
Not here for the past.
For the praise.
The fancy suits.
Or the champagne flutes.
Not here for the celebrations.
And for the record.
Not here for number 5.
I’m here to create.
He makes something out of nothing.
He creates magic.
